sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Goldman Sachs Group ( GS ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.7%.
Year to date, Goldman Sachs Group has lost about 17.0% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Verizon Communications ( VZ ), trading down 0.2%.
Verizon Communications is showing a gain of 16.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading up 0.5%, and Boeing ( BA ), trading up 2.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
